channel.title: Ram?
channel.description:
My old laptop only has like, 470MB of RAM. And the processor is 1.8Ghz. Which one (RAM/Processor) determines how many people can get on your server at one time without lag? Cause I'm prolly going to buy myself a new PC and I want to know what to look for.
Thanks, Play For Keeps.

item.title: Ram?
item.dc:creator: @Play_For_Keeps Play For Keeps
item.description:
@Play_For_Keeps wrote:

If you look at enkrona 2.7 server, they have over 100 people online all the time, and their server doesn’t crash. Does moparscape really crash your client if you get over 50 ppl?

Read full topic

item.title: Ram?
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

depends on the server if coded good can hold 500 players on cable connection with specs of 500 mhz processer 256 mb ram.

Read full topic

item.title: Ram?
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

thats true but for the majority of the servers on moparscape after about 50 people something in their coding causes a fatal error and the server crashes

Read full topic

item.title: Ram?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

It is RAM. Remember that when more people join, it uses up more RAM. No one else can join, if the RAM is completely being used. Therefore, the more RAM the better. Just go to Best Buy and buy 1gb and you can have approximately 100-150 more people on your server at one time.

Read full topic

item.title: Ram?
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

Just because you have good RAM don’t mean you’re not going to lag, you could have 2gig and you’re players will still lag some times, It all depends who logs in with good connection. I don’t host any more but with my 256MB I could have 20-25 people no with out it lagging. BTW I had 20-25 on b4 Silabsoft came around and made her client.

Read full topic

item.title: Ram?
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

i got a 2.4 ghz duel core processor and 1GB of RAM and i can get 150+ with no lag and only takes up about 75% of my RAM, but thats with no other programs up, only the server

Read full topic

item.title: Ram?
item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707
item.description:
@squal707 wrote:

may b not sure just wait and see =]

Read full topic

item.title: Ram?
item.dc:creator: @Play_For_Keeps Play For Keeps
item.description:
@Play_For_Keeps wrote:

I need to get over 100, cause I don’t even have to put my server on the status page, and I will get over 35 people. So you think I could get over 100 people with 1GB of RAM and 2.0Ghz processor?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707

quite a few i assum i can handle bout 20-30 with no lagg with 254 mb… so alot for you =p

item.title: Ram?
item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707
item.description:
@squal707 wrote:

alot of it has to do with how fast your processor is and some has to deal with the ram… so just get 1 with high ram and a fast processor

ive got a fast processor and only 254mb of ram my server never lags nor does any program

Read full topic
